name: RQG_ACCOUNT
description: This table holds the accounts for this requisition grouper used with lab billing.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the requisition grouper record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the account which is associated with this requisition grouper.
